item.title: BO - Design - Image Settings - Import Image type - feature not integrated -
item.description: BO - Design - Image Settings - Import Image type - feature not integrated - Details Component : Core Status : Blocked Scenario : https://forge.prestashop.com/browse/TEST-5157 Steps Step Description Expected result Clic on the “Generate theme image settings” button at the top right A modal should be displayed Case : You don’t have yml file for your theme with image type * Clic on the “import” button * You’ll have a red alert with the message " Your themes doesn’t have image types configured" * You still have 0 image type Case : You have yml file for your theme with image type * Clic on the “import” button * You’ll have a success message “The settings have been successfully updated” * You’ll have your image type Case : You have the same yml file for your theme with image type * Clic on the “import” button * You’ll have a red alert with the message " Your themes doesn’t have image types configured" * You still have the same image type Case : You have the same name on your image type but not the same size on your yml * Clic on the “import” button * You’ll have a red alert with the message " Your themes doesn’t have image types configured" * You still have the same image type Case : You have the same size on your image type but not the same name on your yml * Clic on the “import” button * You’ll have a success message “The settings have been successfully updated” * You’ll have twice your image type

item.description: BO - Design - Image Settings - Check category image format Details Component : Core Status : Automated Scenario : https://forge.prestashop.com/browse/TEST-6018 Test : https://github.com/PrestaShop/PrestaShop/tree/develop/tests/UI/campaigns/functional/BO/08_design/06_imageSettings/14_checkCategoryImageFormat.ts Steps Step Description Expected result * Go to BO > Design > Image settings * Scroll down to have image generation option * JPEG/PNG should be checked * You can’t unchecked the JPEG/PNG format * Base format should be : “Use PNG only if the base image is in PNG format” Check the checkboxes next to Webp The checkbox should be checked and the Webp is enabled * Go to Catalog > categories * Clic on “Add new category” * You should have all your categories * You have the page to create a category * Set a category with a name and three image in PNG * Clic on “Save” * You should have the name on the category name and the url of image on image selection * You have a green modal and it say : “Successful update” * Go to Catalog > categories * Clic on “Add new category” * You should have all your categories * You have the page to create a category * Set a category with a name and three image in JPEG * Clic on “Save” * You should have the name on the category name and the url of image on image selection * You have a green modal and it say : “Successful update” * Go to Catalog > categories * Clic on “Add new category” * You should have all your categories * You have the page to create a category * Set a category with a name and three image in WebP * Clic on “Save” * You should have the name on the category name and the url of image on image selection * You have a green modal and it say : “Successful update” Go to your folder [yourshop]/img/c There is no image on Webp Drag and drop [idofyour category PNG]_category_default.
